CustomField.description: To view opportunity stages in a particular order. Japol is using this in a list view.
CustomField.formula: IF(ISPICKVAL(StageName,"Qualification Needed"), "1", IF(ISPICKVAL(StageName,"Need to Submit"), "2", IF(ISPICKVAL(StageName,"Application Submitted"), "3", IF(ISPICKVAL(StageName,"Proposal Received"), "4", IF(ISPICKVAL(StageName,"Proposal Presented"), "5", IF(ISPICKVAL(StageName,"Need Info From Client"), "6", ""))))))
CustomField.label: Order
